AT.name: ONE PIECE Unlimited World Red
AT.description: Die Strohhut-Piraten schließen Freundschaft mit einem mysteriösen Waschbären namens Pato, der über die Fähigkeit verfügt, Dinge durch das Schreiben auf Blätter zu erschaffen. Sie helfen ihrem neuen Freund bei seiner Mission, "jemanden zu treffen". Pato führt die Mannschaft dann zu der Vergessenen Insel, auf der alle Strohhut-Piraten außer Ruffy von einem gemeinen Piraten gefangen genommen werden, der sich selbst "der Rote Graf" nennt und der vor 2 Jahren aus Impel Down entkommen ist. Mit Patos Hilfe muss Ruffy seine Mannschaft aus den Fängen des Feindes befreien und herausfinden, welche fiesen Pläne der Rote Graf eigentlich hegt ...

AU.name: ONE PIECE Unlimited World Red
AU.description: The Straw Hat Pirates befriend a mysterious raccoon named Pato who possesses a power to create anything drawn onto a leaf. In order to help their new friend, they agree to assist Pato on an mission “to meet someone;” Pato then leads the crew to the Forgotten Island where all the Straw Hat Pirates except Luffy are kidnapped by a wicked pirate named The Red Count, who had escaped from Impel Down two years ago. With Pato’s help, Luffy must fight to recover his crew from the enemy’s grasp and find out exactly what The Red Count’s evil plots are…

BG.name: ONE PIECE Unlimited World Red
BG.description: The Straw Hat Pirates befriend a mysterious raccoon named Pato who possesses a power to create anything drawn onto a leaf. In order to help their new friend, they agree to assist Pato on an mission “to meet someone;” Pato then leads the crew to the Forgotten Island where all the Straw Hat Pirates except Luffy are kidnapped by a wicked pirate named The Red Count, who had escaped from Impel Down two years ago. With Pato’s help, Luffy must fight to recover his crew from the enemy’s grasp and find out exactly what The Red Count’s evil plots are…

BE.name: ONE PIECE Unlimited World Red
BE.description: L'équipage du Chapeau de Paille se lie d'amitié avec un mystérieux raton-laveur nommé Pato qui a le pouvoir de matérialiser tout ce qu'il dessine sur une feuille. Pour aider leur nouvel ami, les pirates acceptent d'aider Pato dans sa mission pour “rencontrer quelqu'un”. Pato guide l'équipage jusqu'à l'Île oubliée où ils sont tous capturés, à l'exception de Luffy, par un méchant pirate appelé le "comte rouge", qui s'est échappé d'Impel Down deux ans auparavant. Avec l'aide de Pato, Luffy devra combattre pour sauver son équipage des griffes de ce nouvel ennemi et en apprendre plus sur les sombres desseins du comte rouge...

ES.name: ONE PIECE Unlimited World Red
ES.description: Los Piratas del Sombrero de Paja han entablado amistad con un misterioso mapache llamado Pato, que posee el poder de crear cualquier cosa que se dibuje sobre una hoja. Para ayudar a su nuevo amigo, aceptarán participar en una misión «para reunirse con alguien». Pato lleva a la tripulación a Isla Perdida, donde todos (excepto Luffy) son secuestrados por el conde Rojo, un pirata malvado que escapó de la prisión de Impel Down hace dos años. Con la ayuda de Pato, Luffy deberá luchar para salvar a su tripulación de las garras del enemigo y descubrir cuáles son los malvados planes del conde Rojo...

IT.name: ONE PIECE Unlimited World Red
IT.description: I pirati di Cappello di paglia giungono in soccorso di Pato, un misterioso procione capace di creare qualsiasi cosa venga disegnata su una foglia. Per aiutare questo nuovo amico, la ciurma accetta di assisterlo nella ricerca di "una certa persona". Pato conduce i pirati sull'Isola Dimenticata, ma qui vengono rapiti dal folle Conte Red, un pirata evaso da Impel Down due anni prima. Solo Rufy sfugge alla cattura, e con l'aiuto di Pato dovrà salvare i suoi compagni dalle grinfie del nemico e scoprire i malefici piani del Conte Red...

With Pato’s help, Luffy must fight to recover his crew from the enemy’s grasp and find out exactly what The Red Count’s evil plots are…

NL.name: ONE PIECE Unlimited World Red
NL.description: De Straw Hat-piraten zijn bevriend geraakt met een geheimzinnige wasbeer, die alles wat op een blad getekend is tot werkelijkheid kan maken. Om hun nieuwe vriend te helpen, besluiten ze met Pato mee te gaan op een missie "om iemand te ontmoeten". Pato brengt de bemanning dan naar het Forgotten Island, waar alle Straw Hat-piraten behalve Luffy ontvoerd worden door de Red Count, een boosaardige piraat die twee jaar geleden uit Impel Down ontsnapt is. Luffy moet nu met de hulp van Pato de bemanning redden uit de klauwen van de vijand en erachter zien te komen wat de Red Count voor snode plannen heeft.

NZ.name: ONE PIECE Unlimited World Red
NZ.description: The Straw Hat Pirates befriend a mysterious raccoon named Pato who possesses a power to create anything drawn onto a leaf. In order to help their new friend, they agree to assist Pato on an mission “to meet someone;” Pato then leads the crew to the Forgotten Island where all the Straw Hat Pirates except Luffy are kidnapped by a wicked pirate named The Red Count, who had escaped from Impel Down two years ago. With Pato’s help, Luffy must fight to recover his crew from the enemy’s grasp and find out exactly what The Red Count’s evil plots are…

PL.name: ONE PIECE Unlimited World Red
PL.description: The Straw Hat Pirates befriend a mysterious raccoon named Pato who possesses a power to create anything drawn onto a leaf. In order to help their new friend, they agree to assist Pato on an mission “to meet someone;” Pato then leads the crew to the Forgotten Island where all the Straw Hat Pirates except Luffy are kidnapped by a wicked pirate named The Red Count, who had escaped from Impel Down two years ago. With Pato’s help, Luffy must fight to recover his crew from the enemy’s grasp and find out exactly what The Red Count’s evil plots are…

PT.name: ONE PIECE Unlimited World Red
PT.description: Os Straw Hat Pirates travam amizade com um guaxinim misterioso chamado Pato que possui o poder de criar tudo o que for desenhado numa folha. De modo a ajudar o seu novo amigo, o grupo concorda prestar assistência a Pato numa missão para “encontrar alguém”. Pato leva então a equipa até à Forgotten Island, onde todos os Straw Hat Pirates - com a exceção de Luffy - são raptados por um pirata malvado chamado The Red Count, que tinha escapado de Impel Down há dois anos. Com a ajuda de Pato, Luffy tem de lutar para recuperar a sua tripulação das garras do inimigo e descobrir quais são afinal os planos malévolos do The Red Count...

RU.name: ONE PIECE Unlimited World Red
RU.description: Пиратам Соломенной шляпы встречается загадочный енот Пато, умеющий создавать вещи по рисунку на листе. Пираты соглашаются помочь новому другу "кое с кем встретиться", и Пато приводит их на Забытый остров, где всю команду, кроме Луффи, похищает сбежавший два года назад из подводной тюрьмы Импел Даун злодей Красный Граф. Луффи предстоит с помощью Пато отбить у врага свою команду и выяснить, что именно замыслил Красный Граф.
